name: Umbrellas
description:
There is a place for you and me.

In 2014 I made this little game as both an attempt to learn puzzlescript and work out my issues with the supposedly-nonexistent queer games scene I wanted to be a part of. The result was Umbrellas. It's messy, awkward, and not much of a game, but it was something that I needed to exist, still need now, and am glad I made. I hope you can find something in this as well. Thank you for playing.
